title: Software Development Engineer - Test
summary: Building a modern GPU Compiler requires a lot of complicated supporting systems and processes to ensure the quality and performance of each release is better than that before. As such we are seeking highly motivated, innovative, and confident individuals to join the LLVM AGX Experience team; You will be responsible developing new tools and systems as well as maintaining our existing infrastructure to amplify the performance of the team by tackling some of the big challenges we face as create compilers for all the GPU’s in our current and future products across iOS, watchOS, tvOS, macOS, and the new visionOS.
description:
In this role you will:
- Support and improve our Pull Request and CI system
- Maintain and support our test fleet, using a combination of cloud-based test systems and physical hardware
- Aid engineers in bringing up new hardware and integrating it into our development and testing processes.
- Create and maintain internal tools and systems such as Ansible-based configuration systems to enhance the productivity of the AGX GPU Compiler team
preferred_qualifications: Familiarity with cloud services and tools, such as docker, AWS, Kubernetes
